attributes.action: Bring Back National Service And Harsher Punishments!
attributes.additional_details: After The Riots In Swansea Last Night - Setting Cars On Fire, Hurling Cars Down A Steep Hill To Crash Into Anything That Was In The Way, Attacking The Police And Anyone Else Trying To Stop Them, Throwing Bricks At Windows & Doors, Scaring Children In Their Own Homes & Making A ‘War Zone’ As It’s Been Described As Something Seriously Needs To Be Done, Whilst Parents And Teachers Cannot Discipline Kids Like They Used To This Is Only Going To Get A Lot Worse! People/kids Need To Learn Respect
attributes.background: Bring Back National Service And Harsher Punishments! Without This We Have No Hope

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bring back National Service mandatory one year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561482

Minimum 8-year custodial sentence for all violent crime and sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579352

Increase sentences for crimes relating to bodily harm of another individual: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576088
